snippet.title: Super Mario Sunshine DS: Nintendo Fan-Games Direct Trailer
snippet.description:
This is the trailer for Super Mario Sunshine DS that was featured in our recent Nintendo Fan-Games Direct! It was really tough to get a good trailer made in time for the event but here it is! I tried to make sure there was a little bit of new stuff featured in this trailer, even if you have been subscribed to my channel and keeping up with all of the updates. I hope you all enjoy it!

NEW DEMO: RELEASING BEFORE THE END OF 2021!

Credits For Sunshine DS (That I know of):
Original Model Ports And FLUDD: Fiachra
Missions and Stage model creating, polishing, and fixing: Hailbot
Just a ton of help in general: Gota7
Short Sleeve Mario and Luigi: SolarZ
Codes and Cool Stuff: Gota7, Starpants, and Josh65536
Corona Mountain and Tall Grass Model Rip: Shugabush
Black and red Nintendo start up logo: Shinramen
Super Mario Sunshine Voices: ShaneMGD

Here is my Twitter. I'm trying to start using it more and could use all the support I can get!
https://twitter.com/Hailb0t

For development and fun gameplay streams, my follow my Twitch!
https://www.twitch.tv/hailb0t

If you want more updates on this project, consider joining these Discords!
My Discord: https://discord.gg/KN8u7sC
SM64DS Hacking Discord: https://discord.gg/BTQ82kB

Thanks for watching! If you enjoyed this video, feel free to subscribe to get more info on content I help make!

Want ways you can support me or donate to me?
- Epic Games Support A Creator Code:   HAILBOT
- PayPal: https://www.paypal.me/Hailbot
- Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/Hailbot

Thank you for making it to the end of the description! :)
